About.text: Hi, I'm <important>Kevin</important>, a software visionary and engineering leader advancing satellite yield systems and artificial intelligence in space.

Endnote.text: I designed this website in <design>Figma</design> and developed it using <ts>TypeScript</ts>, <three>Three.js</three>, and the <next>Next.js</next> framework for <react>React</react>. All associated code is open source and available on <github>GitHub</github>. This website—and all its <versions>prior versions</versions>—are continuously deployed with <host>Vercel</host>.
